Trade/Device Name(s): BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System Gatifloxacin 0.25-8 μg/mL
BD PhoenixM Automated Microbiology System for use with the antimicrobial agent Gatifloxacin 0.25-8 ug/mL - Gram-negative ID/AST or AST only Phoenix panels
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Devices
Specimen Type(s): Isolates from pure culture of aerobic and facultative anaerobic Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria of human origin
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System Gatifloxacin panels for automated antimicrobial susceptibility testing of Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility by MIC of Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria isolates from pure culture for Enterobacteriaceae, Non-Enterobacteriaceae, and most Gram-positive genera (Staphylococcus, Enterococcus, Streptococcus) using Gatifloxacin 0.25-8 μg/mL
